trends: There have been no other sightings in Cedar Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from picking my daughter up at her fathers. My daughter was looking out the window at the stars and noticed the object. We had no idea what we were looking at, but we knew it wasn't normal. A Huge black triangle blocking out the stars, 5 balls of light flew behind it heading south. It moved very slow, but the balls of light moved very fast. Then it was gone.
Summary: Huge black triangle blocking out the stars
